extends java.lang.Object

  • Constructor Details

    • Actor

      public Actor​(int x, int y, java.lang.String image, java.lang.String type)
      Constructor for creating a general Actor.
      Parameters:
      x - This is the x-coordinate of the Actor's position on the display.
      y - This is the y-coordinate of the Actor's position on the display.
      image - This is the image that represents the Actor on the display.
      type - The type of Actor this Actor is.

    • Actor

      Another constructor for creating an Actor.
      Parameters:
      x - This is the x-coordinate of the Actor's position on the display.
      y - This is the y-coordinate of the Actor's position on the display.
